reviewText: Love the tournaments but the editing I hated. the way these dvds are made its just moving way too fast and there is way too much commentary. its like the production crew was like "HEY LETS TAKE ALL 4 ROUNDS OF THE TOURNAMENT AND SEE HOW FAST WE CAN NARRATE THE WHOLE THING"  well if it was a race theyd win, but for coverage it was horrible. I recommend the masters dvds or the 2008 US OPEN. still highlights but atleast YOU CAN BREATHE.
Watching and learning.  There ought to be a streaming option for people!  Pick the year, course, player, sit back after a morning round and watch the pros.

I bought a lot of Master's, US Open or British Open DVD over time but this Players is special.  We get a glimpse of what a pratice round is about as well as many behind the scenes shot on top of the highlights of the tournament.  Probably the best highlights DVD on the market.
